document.full_text: syrian security forces and gunmen loyal to president bashar al-assad shot dead at least nine civilians on sunday in a sweep on the coastal town on jabla, the syrian human rights organization sawasiah said.
document.title: security forces kill 9 syrians in sunni district
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces and gunmen loyal to president bashar al-assad shot dead at least nine civilians on sunday in a sweep on the coastal town on jabla, the syrian human rights organization sawasiah said.
